title: Using Apple Each Day Can Keep The Doctor Away
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: With Apple having lost a third of its value since October, are investors dealing with a Silicon Valley has-been or a will-be whose shares are now attractively priced? Apple appears to be deftly pivoting from an area of slowing growth to the area that shows the highest growth potential, namely digital health. Learn more about your ad choices.
